column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Shalyn - Thanks for the review. Apologies that you didn't find the JINYA Chicken Ramen flavorful enough. With any preparation
column2: there is the possibility that our ramen chefs made a mistake. They prepare several hundred bowls of ramen on any given day. Please know
column4: that if you are not 100% satisfied with any of the food we serve
column5: just inform your server and he/she will offer something else or gladly remove it from your tab. Our top priority is for every customer to leave our establishment satisfied. Full stop. Thank you again for the kind words
column6: and we are glad to know you are willing to give us another shot.
